reuters.title: FIRST AMERICAN <FAMR.O> BUYS BACK STOCK
reuters.body: First American Financial Corp said it repurchased 997,756 shares, or 18 pct of its own common stock, from American Century Corp <ACT> for 29.50 dlrs per share in cash and two real estate properties in California. Concurrent with the closing of the deal, its First American Title Insurance Co unit entered into a long-term lease arrangement for the properties, First American said. It also said the stock it is repurchasing will be retired and not re-issued. Reuter 
